name: Fertilizer Farm: Idle Tycoon
description:
Poop! Yup - this is a game about poo.

What else to say? It's cute, CUTE, C U T E! Unlock multiple creatures, receive SPECIAL animals, collect different POOPs!

Breed animals, collect poo, make fertilizer, receive PROFITS, Become BILLIONAIRE.


Features:
- Unlock multiple animals.
- Tou never know what's next! Bear? Chicken? Or maybe unicorn?! Find out!
- Get hundrets of animals to poop for you.
- Collect turd and grow your business!
- Catch golden poos and earn millions.
- Intuitive gameplay with idle clicker mechanics!
- Offline game - no internet connection needed!
- Become billionaire.

Have fun!
